title: Getting banned
body: I don't get it i afk for 5 min and and win the game but still get a 20 min ban??? and also i carried that game to

replies.body: Are you really debating that trolling/afk a game but you still win it ,is not bannable?

Winning/carrying the game is irrelevant. What matters is whether you were present for the whole game or not.

That said, you wouldn't receive a 20 minute LPQ from a single instance of a 5 minute AFK, and even if it was from a single instance it would most certainly *have* to be a lot more serious than 5 minutes as you wouldn't skip punishments tiers (in this case, 5 and 10 minute LPQ) unless it was under extreme circumstances.

> Winning/carrying is actually relevant in this case.

It's really not.

The rules are the rules, and they don't bend simply because the match they were broken in resulted in a win, whether the offending player was responsible for that win or not. Skill does not determine whether a player is deserving of punishment.
